TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN.description: A secret key for authorizing the twitter API
TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN.value: enter your twitter bearer token here

SLACK_BEARER_TOKEN.description: A secret key for authorizing the slack API
SLACK_BEARER_TOKEN.value: enter your slack bearer token here

DISCORD_BEARER_TOKEN.description: A secret key for authorizing the discord API
DISCORD_BEARER_TOKEN.value: enter your discord bearer token here

ADMIN_PASSWORD.value: enter your password for admin user

JWT_PRIVATE_KEY.description: A jwt private key for jwt tokenizer
JWT_PRIVATE_KEY.value: enter your jwt private key for admin user
